ygData.subject: Dark Elf Shadow Warrior - Newbie Fodder
ygData.msgSnippet: Last night I just started a Dark Elf. Walk on the Wild Side. My first real character experience requiring so much swimming.  Anyhow, none of the NPC s, after
ygData.messageBody:
Last night I just started a Dark Elf.
Walk on the Wild Side.

My first real character experience requiring so much
swimming. Anyhow, none of the NPC's, after frequent
hailings, appear to have a voice. /Consider is very silly.

I encoutered a few pets like a skeleton and
considered they were best to leave alone for now.

There are some funny ghouls, one looks as if on patrol.

West Freeport has it's bats, rats and snakes.
What would I be looking for in the Dark City?

Thanks
Maxilus
(on Test Server)
